# Raptor's Sight (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Druid Spells|Druid 1]], [[1st Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 1]], [[Sky (Domain)|Sky 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 hour/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Races of the Wild (WotC), pg. 175

Your visual acuity improves dramatically. You gain a +5 competence bonus on [[Perception (Skill)|Perception]] (3.5 Spot) checks. If you have 5 or more ranks in [[Perception (Skill)|Perception]] (3.5 Spot), you take only half the normal range increment penalty for ranged attacks (–1 per range increment instead of –2).
